nodes.text: This  murderous  campaign only demonstrates the importance of the governing council in bringing democracy to Iraq
This shows all those sceptics that the [members of the governing council] are the real targets of those who are trying to destroy the New Iraq
The council is extremely dangerous for the terrorists and for whom is trying to destabilize Iraq
We are trying to bring the democracy to Iraq
the insurgents and terrorists working to destabilize Iraq understand who their most important enemies are
many critics   including some within the Coalition Provisional Authority   have dismissed the council as a group of squabbling exiles and minor politicians with little popular support
There is a murderous campaign against the governing council
If an institution is dangerous for terrorists it is likely to be attacked by them
